pageProduct.name: U by Kotex Extra Overnight Pads Wing 10 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

U by Kotex® Overnight Extra Pads provide mega protection that hugs your body for ultimate comfort. Overnight is just a little bit longer, a fraction wider and equipped with Anti-Leak Guards (side and back) for helping prevent leakage when you're lying down. So enjoy that beauty snooze without a worry.

  • With fast absorbing blue core to provide greater protection by quickly drawing fluid into the pad
  • With extra width and length for added overnight protection
  • With anti-leak side and back guards that activate when in contact with fluid to provide superior leakage protection
  • With a soft cotton-like cover for a dry, comfortable feeling, and wings to help keep pads in place
  • Perfect for heavy flow and overnight use.

Boxed Contents: 10 Overnigth Extra Pads

Size: 10 Pads

Directions

Remove wrapper and peel strip in one quick move

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Do not flush
